data.message: Something new that I would love to see on Facebook is the ability to search within your own page for example I have a recipe that I posted a year ago and I would love to be able to type in keywords to find that recipe thank you

replies.message: Thanks for the great idea, Kaia! We listen to all the feedback we get from the Facebook community and would love to hear more from you. If you have any further suggestions, please share them with us here: on.fb.me/1N2bhYs. -Elizabeth
